channel.title: Conversations With Coon
channel.description: Andy Coon is an award winning documentary filmmaker who is reaching out to the creative community to discuss their work, passion, ideas, and find out what inspires them. Get to know the people that inspire Andy and hopefully put some fire under his ass to produce a new film.
channel.itunes:author: Andy B Coon
channel.itunes:keywords: film, independent, music, creative, video, dvd author, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, fresh, unique,

image.title: Conversations with Coon
image.description: Interviewing creative people around the world and they all have one thing in common... They inspire Andy.

item.title: Interview with Sarah Phelps producer/manager of PES Films
item.description: Andy candidly speaks with Sarah about her work with PES and his amazing short films.
item.itunes:keywords: film, independent, music, creative, video, dvd author, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, fresh, unique

item.title: Interview with Blake Faucette creator of Series DVD
item.description: Andy talks to his buddy Blake Faucette about creating Series DVD.
item.itunes:keywords: film, independent, music, creative, video, dvd author, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, fresh, unique

item.title: Interview with Deborah Scranton Director of The War Tapes
item.description: Andy speaks with Deborah about how she directed the first film that was shot by soldiers in Iraq.
item.itunes:keywords: film, independent, music, creative, video, dvd author, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, fresh, unique

item.title: Conversation with Craig Aaron Communications Director of Free Press
item.description: Craig talks about how save the internet dot com and how they are protecting Network Neutrality.
item.itunes:keywords: film, independent, music, creative, video, dvd author, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, fresh, unique

item.title: Greensboro's Child
item.description: Andy releases his Award Winning Documentary about the Greensboro Massacre and a young man that was haunted by that day.
item.itunes:keywords: film, independent, doucmentary, creative, video, Kwame Cannon, filmmaker, producer, editor, dvd, innovative, 1979, Greensboro Massacre
